title: 23: S4E23 – "Sinister Solutions" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Kantuno, Jordan Vanhoozer, Seth Paul, and Tim van Kessel, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about eclectic entertainment, ruinous relationships, typographical terror, and hate-filled houses. In this episode, we highlight the RAK Magnetic Wristband: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/rak/ Sign up to our mailing list by January 5, 2020 for your chance to win one FREE: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/otis/ See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e23
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
